questions.0: What would you want to use unused space in the city for?
questions.1: What could your city do to promote a healthy lifestyle?
questions.2: Which problems should the government solve in the next 10 years?
questions.3: What are the biggest problems in your neighborhood?
questions.4: What work do you do every day that you are not paid for?

questions.6: What would make you give up your car?
questions.7: If you were free to create your perfect job, what would it be like?
